text: YG Entertainment is a South Korean entertainment company which was founded in 1996. It was founded by Yang Hyun-suk and the current CEO as of 2022 is Hwang Bo-kyung. ==Artists== All of the artists under YG Entertainment are collectively known as YG Family, similarly to SM Town and JYP Nation. ===Recording artists=== Groups * AKMU * WINNER * iKON * BLACKPINK * TREASURE * BABYMONSTER Sub-units * GD & TOP (inactive) * GD X TAEYANG (inactive) Soloists * Sandara Park * Tablo * Lee Hi * Kang Seung-yoon * Bobby * Jennie * Rosé * Lisa * Eun Jiwon * Jisoo Record Producers * Teddy Park * Choice37 * Jihyuk Jung (David) * Kang Uk-jin * Perry * AiRPLAY * Lydia Paek * Ham Seung- cheon * Future Bounce * iHwak * Rovin * Millennium (Choi Rae-sung) * Diggy * Liøn ===Independent labels/artists=== THEBLACKLABEL * Teddy Park (founder/producer) * KUSH (founder/producer) * Zion.T * Somi * Vince * Løren (under subsidiary Fire Exit Records * Okasian (producer) * Peejay (producer) * R.Tee (producer) * 24 (producer) ===Actors=== List of actors under YG. * Bae Jung-nam * Cha Seung-won *
